stories.text: I am very interested in how people learn STEM, and would love to know about your experience, and how you felt about learning using paper-based books/pen/pencil (analogue, if you will) vs using digital books and resources.
stories.title: Did you learn STEM with paper books or digital ones?

stories.text:
Hey,

We develop a mobile app tool and doing research about mobile design&dev process.

What is the hardest part of mobile app development?

Share your experiences about the biggest challenges no matter what stage it was: from discovery, UX, visual conception, etc to coding, testing.
stories.title: What's the hardest part of mobile app development?
